title: Sindh Home Minister Meets with Lawyer Delegation, Receives Ajrak Gift
content:
SUKKUR, Oct 25 (APP): Sindh Home Minister Zia-ul-Hassan Lanjar met with a delegation of lawyers from the Progressive Panel of the Sindh Bar Council, led by Advocate Chairman Muhammad Rizwan Haq Malik, at a program held in Sukkur here on Saturday.

The lawyersâ€™ delegation, comprising members of the Malik Advocates Organization, was warmly received by the minister. During the meeting, Advocate Chairman Muhammad Rizwan Haq Malik expressed support for the Progressive Panel in the upcoming elections, with candidates including Qurban Malano and Shafqat Rahim Rajput.

The minister was presented with an Ajrak, a traditional Sindhi cloth, as a token of appreciation. The meeting also provided an opportunity for the lawyers to discuss various issues and strengthen ties with the minister.
